content: The top priority is... separating the rest area from the work area. Maybe put the chair and table here, moo?
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 黑屏和表达感谢_多杰朗

content: {A吉祥如意}I want to protect everyone's good fortune with my hats. It is my number one priority.
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 黑屏和表达感谢_多杰朗

content: Speaking of good fortune moo, I once lost my own hat, but the sky above sent a breeze, and placed it right back on my head.
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 黑屏和表达感谢_多杰朗

content: Besides the Dough, I went to the beach and caught some seafood to make you this <style=Highlight>Black Crab & Bamboo Shoot Soup</style>. Please try it!
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 黑屏和表达感谢_多杰朗

content: Thank you again for preparing the hat-making table and chair. A person's head connects them to the sky above. That's why we need hats to protect the fortune we "wear" on our heads.
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 黑屏和表达感谢_多杰朗

content: {A远眺}Good fortune rides the wind in these hats, bringing gifts— Some Dough! I want to share this luck with you.
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 黑屏和表达感谢_多杰朗

content: Can't hang the lantern above the table. It'll cast shadows on the hats... HMM! Good, all done.

content: {A挠头}<style=SizeBig>HMM! So comfy...</style> Must keep calm.

content: {A心虚目移}Actually, my normal speaking voice is HMM!... Very loud. I'm reining it in right now.

content: {A看我的}From now on, my home is yours too. Come by anytime, and stay as long as you like. Don't be a stranger moo.
